nature_language: [当前位置苏州,目标位置北京,旅行人数2,旅行天数5] 我们两个人想去北京玩一趟，打算坐高铁往返，帮我安排一下行程和住宿酒店。想多去一些历史景点。
nature_language_en: [Current location: Suzhou, Destination: Beijing, Number of travelers: 2, Duration of trip: 5 days] The two of us want to take a trip to Beijing and plan to travel by plane round-trip. Please help me arrange the itinerary and accommodation. We would like to visit many historical sites.
